title: CVS Health 's revenue 2010 - 2017 by segment
summary: Overall Pharmacy services is gradually increasing, Retail pharmacy is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Pharmacy services, and lastly, 2. Retail pharmacy.
The minimum Revenue in billion USD about 67.8, occured at 2014 by Retail pharmacy.
The greatest difference of Revenue in billion USD between Pharmacy services and Retail pharmacy occurs at Year 2015 and the smallest difference occurs at 2014.
